pullRequest.title: Third-party exporter loading framework
pullRequest.bodyText:
Exporters are packaged in separate jar-files and loaded through the ServiceLoader mechanism. Exporters need to specify the implementation under META-INF according to general SPI guidelines.
Shading of any references to the OpenTelemetry API are handled at load time, keeping the build scripts of the exporters clean.
Currently, there's a exportersupport module for sharing factory and config interfaces between the agent and exporters. This should be moved to opentelemetry-java at some point.

commit.message: Made the dummy exporter slightly less stupid
Use SPI pattern for loading. Added runtime shader
Changed to do shading on binary stream instead of loading the class first
Protected the runtime shader from having its internals shaded
Cleaned up and fixed test issues
